subject: ACTION REQUIRED: Payroll details confirmation
body:
We were unable to process your payroll run. Please confirm your bank account details at the link below to avoid delays: http://hospital-payroll-secure.com/login

If you did not request this change, contact Payroll immediately.

subject: Security alert: Verify your account now
body: We detected unusual sign-in activity on your account. To restore normal access, please verify your account now at https://hospital-it-reset.org. Do not share your credentials with anyone.

subject: Urgent: Invoice requires immediate payment
body: Attention: A payment for your department could not be completed. Please review the attached invoice and confirm the updated bank details so we can process payment today.

subject: Document requires signature to release funds
body: A document requires your signature to proceed with the scheduled funds release. Please review and sign the document here: http://docusign-verify.org. If you did not expect this request, contact the sender before taking action.

subject: Immediate: Remote access credential revalidation
body: Your remote access credentials must be revalidated. Please enter your network username and password at the link provided to prevent access interruption.

subject: Emergency maintenance – run attached tool
body: Emergency maintenance is required on your workstation. Download and run the attached file to complete the fix immediately.

subject: Wire transfer instructions update – URGENT
body: Attention: A payment for your department could not be completed. Please review the attached invoice and confirm the updated bank details so we can process payment today.

subject: Voicemail with confidential info – listen now
body: You have a new voicemail that may contain confidential information. Listen to the message here: http://voicemail-access.org. If unexpected, report it to the helpdesk and do not forward the link.

subject: MFA reauthorization required immediately
body: We detected unusual sign-in activity on your account. To restore normal access, please verify your account now at https://hospital-it-reset.org. Do not share your credentials with anyone.

subject: Confirm attached payroll file for immediate processing
body: Please find the attached payroll file and confirm bank routing for immediate processing. Failure to confirm will delay payments.
